name: Hardfloor
description:
'''Hardfloor''' is a German electronic music duo, consisting of [[:de:Oliver Bondzio|Oliver Bondzio]] and [[Ramon Zenker]]. Their most famous track is "Acperience 1" (often titled more simply as "Acperience" on many [[compilation album]]s) and chosen by [[Feargal Sharkey]] as one of his 'Inheritance Tracks' when interviewed on UK's [[BBC Radio 4]].

Their distinctive [[acid house]] sound is attributed to their skill at manipulating [[Roland TB-303]] bass [[synthesiser]]s, using up to six of these machines at once. Their [[United Kingdom|UK]] [[record chart|chart]] [[hit record|hits]] include "Hardtrance Acperience" (1992), "Trancescript" (1993) and the [[remix]] of the  aforementioned "Acperience" (1997). Their 1996 [[album]], ''Home Run'', peaked at No. 68 in the [[UK Albums Chart]].
